text: Selection is a 1982 EP by Canadian band 54-40. It was the band's first release, appearing on the independent label Mo-Da-Mu. Although now out of print, the album and its 1984 follow up Set the Fire were re-released in 1997 on the compilation album, Sound of Truth: The Independent Collection. ==Track listing== # "Yank" # "He's Got" # "Vows, Sobs, Tears & Kisses" # "Selection" # "Re-In-Living" # "(Jamming With) Lawrence" Category:54-40 albums Category:1982 debut EPs
title: Selection (album)
